# <a name="turn-off-focused-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="162a1-102">Odaklanmış Gelen Kutusu'nu kapatma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="162a1-102">Turn off Focused Inbox</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="162a1-103">Sayfanın üst kısmında vites simgesini seçin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="162a1-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="162a1-104">Ayarlar bölmesini açmak için.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="162a1-104">to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="162a1-105">Ayarlar bölmesinde, Odaklanmış **Gelen Kutusu** geçişini kapatın' a taşıyın.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="162a1-105">In the Settings pane, move the **Focused Inbox** toggle to off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="162a1-106">Daha fazla bilgi için [bkz.](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2#bkmk_outlookonweb)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="162a1-106">For more information, see [Turn off Focused Inbox](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2#bkmk_outlookonweb).</span></span>
